title: QUIZ MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
subtitle: Sign in to your account
welcome_message: Manage and monitor all your quizzes with ease. Create engaging quizzes, track performance, and analyze results all in one powerful platform designed for educators and administrators.
select_room_desc: Choose your department and enter the access code to continue to Quiz App.
room_selection_required: Please select a room to continue
enter_department_access_code_guide: Please enter the 6-digit access code for the selected department.
